description: '''Bachatón''' (also known as '''bachateo''') is a [[fusion genre]] of reggaeton from [[Puerto Rico]] as well as bachata from the [[Dominican Republic]]. Bachaton combines [[bachata (music)|bachata]] melodies and [[reggaeton]] style beats, lyrics, rapping, and [[disc jockey]]ing. The word "bachatón" is a [[Blend word|portmanteau]] of "bachata" and "reggaeton". "Bachatón" was coined and widely accepted in 2005. It is a subgenre of [[reggaeton]] and [[bachata (music)|bachata]].
